did.unittitle: Vollinger, William. Now Shall My Head Be Lifted Up Above My Enemies (Danny Velasco's Testimony) for Brass Quintet

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pieces included: 1 score. Notes: submission letter housed with Christ and his bride… Note on envelope: VW1.1 .02, VW1.2 .07, VW1.3 .06. This piece was also submitted for consideration in a later festival in 2011 in a different format as a visual perforamce on DVD. It was decided to house the submissions seperately as they are in different formats and were submitted for consideration in two different festival years..
